detail.subject: 대기업 두바이 Digital Marketing Campaign Analyst 대리과장급
description: 1. 의뢰고객사 - [국내 최대 제조사] 국내 No.1 대기업 두바이법인
2. 채용포지션 – Digital Marketing Campaign Analyst (대리~과장급)
3. 직무 및 자격요건
- 해외 현지법인 디지털마케팅 캠페인 분석
- 중동 마켓 Digital Marketing Campaign Analysis
- 마케팅 효과 분석
- 디지털 마케팅 , 브랜드 마케팅 , 채널마케팅 , 트레이드 마케팅 , 데이터분석 등 해당 경력 5년~13년
- 통계 tool 사용가능자 ( Google Analytics , SiteCatalyst , Coremetrics 등 )
- 기본 OA 활용 능숙자 (엑셀 pivot tables , advanced formulas , etc.)
- 영어 소통 가능자 (중상급 이상)
- 4년제 이상 유관학과 전공자
- 서남아시아 , 무슬림 국가 ( 중동 지역 ) 등 해외법인 / 해외근무 유경험자
- 해외 출장에 결격 사유가 없는 자.
우대사항:
- 가전 , IT , Mobile 액세서리 등 디지털마케팅 경력자
- 아랍어 등 사용가능자
Responsibilities:
Lead comprehensive digital marketing campaign analysis to influence/support marketing and business strategies towards optimized customer acquisition and sale conversion.
- Develop a deep understanding of the business, priorities, to advise on suitable measurement strategies
- Analyze online user behavior, conversion data and customer journeys to deliver a funnel analysis and multi-channel attribution and generate cross-channel recommendation
- Perform ROI analysis to evaluate efficiency and effectiveness of different marketing campaigns
- Develop metrics & KPI fr
ameworks, dashboards and measurement scorecards for user behavior & conversion data across all paid channel
- Deliver advanced analysis to identify correlations like regression analysis
- Focus on paid channels and optimize spending based on analysis, refine and optimize the end-to-end campaign strategy and tactics for lead acquisition and conversion
- recommendations
- Weekly campaign reporting on key metrics, analyzing and interpreting all data sources/trends to provide actionable insights
- Manage campaign tagging in line with defined taxonomy
- Using available data sources to deep dive and troubleshoot campaign (and overall) performance issues and propose methodical optimization tests, both on-site and campaign based
- Collaborate with digital team members as well as business divisions to identify trends quickly and work with them on monitoring recommended actions
- Work closely with Media and Web Analytics team to deliver an integrated analysis
- Develop measurement fr
ameworks based on business & campaign requirements and develop tracking tags to track defined KPIs. Collaborate with technical resources to guide and QA the implementations.

- Partner with planning, strategy and account services teams to provide business insights through online secondary research and analyzing consumer behavior data for developing case studies for awards & internal circulation.
- Become go-to-expert for any data requests & researches related to growth of digital & social media channels, best practices & examples.
Essential skills and experience:
The role requires excellent business acumen and good stakeholder management as well as technical skills and experience in data analysis, defining trends and generating insights.
- Experience in working within a marketing/business intelligence environment
- Solid understanding of online conversion optimization and UX principles
- High level of experience working with analytical softwares (e.g. Google Analytics, SiteCatalyst, Coremetrics, etc.)
- Thorough understanding of attribution models, customer cohorts, and data analysis -SQL experience is a huge plus (or Chartio, Looker, Mode, Tableau experience).
- High level of experience in data analysis techniques and advanced Excel
- Fluent in web technologies, digital analytics, CRM, digital media, and various customer experience & data management & visualization tools.
- Significant experience with MarTech/AdTech platforms
- Proactive and solution-oriented with excellent organization skills and ability to multi-task
- Creative thinker with strong analytical skills -- comfortable interpreting multiple data sources, deriving actionable media insights (ROI) and using them to inform future campaigns
- Ability to collaborate cross-functionally within a fast-paced environment
- Solid understanding of data reporting and digital advertising best practices
- Demonstrated ability to learn quickly, and manage change effectively
4. 전형방법
- 서류전형→ 면접전형(실무/임원)→ 최종합격자 발표
5. 채용 및 근무여건
- 근 무 지 : UAE / 두바이
- 채용형태 : 정규직
- 직급 / 연봉 : 면접시 협의
◈ 제출서류
- 이력서:자기소개서(사진첨부, 연락처, 희망연봉 기재)
- MS word로 작성 요망
아래 연락처로 검토가능한 이력서를 보내주시면, review 후 연락드리겠습니다.
좋은 기회 되시길 바랍니다.
문의사항 연락처정보
* 헤드헌팅 HR컨설팅㈜ 글로벌본부 Edward Ahn / Executive Director
* 메일주소 : edward@hrcon.co.kr
HR컨설팅㈜는 헤드헌팅 전문업체로 현재 40여명의 헤드헌터가 전문분야별로 나누어져 헤드헌팅 업무를 진행하고 있습니다. HR 컨설팅㈜는 구직을 의뢰한 분의 신원은 철저히 보안을 유지하고 있으며 구직을 의뢰한 분에게는 일체의 사례를 받지 않고 있습니다. *항상 최고의 파트너로 함께합니다.*
